So one day, we decided to take a little trip to the beach.
You know, it was just a regular day, it wasn't too sunny.
Eliana has always been afraid of the water.
I thought there were sharks in the water.
Your sister was like, "Just jump in the water and see what happens."
So, Eliana, she goes in the water and she panics like crazy.
But eventually she starts getting braver and...
...at one point, she was even playing in the water.
She finally started seeing that she was gonna be okay.
And she hasn't been scared of water since then.
